trans-unit.source: Typically, component information does not change for the life of a process.
trans-unit.target: Normalt ändras komponenten inte för en process.

trans-unit.source: During design time, however, you can change the component's properties or events.
trans-unit.target: Medan du designar, men kan du ändra den här komponenten egenskaper eller händelser.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the component's information in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> becomes out-of-date, and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Därför kan komponentloggningsinformation i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>blir inaktuella, och en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event is also raised when a <xref:System.Type> is changed during design time.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>händelsen är också aktiveras när en <xref:System.Type>ändras under designtillfället.</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>

trans-unit.source: A RefreshEventArgs object specifies the data associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event; that is, the component and the type of component that changed.
trans-unit.target: Ett RefreshEventArgs objekt anger vilka data som är associerade med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>händelse; att komponenten och typ av komponent som ändrats.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>

trans-unit.source: The RefreshEventArgs class provides <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A> properties to get the component or type that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: RefreshEventArgs-klassen innehåller <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A>och <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A>Egenskaper för att hämta komponenten eller typ som aktiveras händelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.TypeChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs.ComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"></xref> class with the component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"> </xref> klass med den komponent som har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"></xref> class with the type of component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventArgs"> </xref> klass med typ av komponent som har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that changed its properties, events, or extenders.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den komponent som ändras dess egenskaper, händelser eller extenders.

trans-unit.source: The component that changed its properties, events, or extenders, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if all components of the same type have changed.
trans-unit.target: Den komponent som ändras dess egenskaper, händelser eller extenders, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om alla komponenter av samma typ har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> that changed its properties or events.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref:System.Type>som ändras dess egenskaper eller händelser.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that changed its properties or events.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>som ändras dess egenskaper eller händelser.</xref:System.Type>
